titles.title: A bill to authorize a cost of living adjustment for the Federal judiciary.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S272)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

bill.summary:
1/11/2009--Introduced.
Authorizes a cost of living adjustment for FY2009 for justices and judges of the United States.
